title: Maintain Cleanroom Environment
description: A cleanroom technician must monitor and maintain the environment where a satellite is being assembled to prevent contamination.

tasks.description: Monitor the cleanroom's particle counters, temperature, and humidity levels to ensure they remain within the specified limits (e.g., ISO 8).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent observes all environmental parameters are nominal.

tasks.description: Perform regular wipe-downs of surfaces with approved cleaning solutions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows the standard cleaning procedure.

tasks.description: Log all environmental data and cleaning activities in the cleanroom logbook.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent maintains a complete and accurate log.
